title: Expand your power base through nepotism and corruption
description: Surround yourself with loyal kin and trusted allies who will support your agenda. This ensures that those in power are personally invested in maintaining your rule.

title: Monopolize the use of force
description: Gain control over the military and police to suppress public dissent and maintain order. Dictators cannot survive for long without disarming the people and buttering up the military.

title: Control information
description: Take over media outlets and control the flow of information to shape public perception and eliminate opposition voices. This includes censoring the internet and social media.

title: Suppress opposition
description: Use legal and extralegal means to weaken or eliminate political opponents and dissenters. This can involve imprisonment, exile, or even assassination.

title: Manipulate elections
description: Rig elections or manipulate electoral processes to ensure your continued hold on power. This can include voter suppression, ballot stuffing, and controlling electoral commissions.

title: Appeal to populism and nationalism
description: Use populist rhetoric and nationalist sentiments to rally support and legitimize your rule. This often involves scapegoating minorities or external enemies.

title: Create a cult of personality
description: Cultivate an image of yourself as the indispensable leader and savior of the nation. This can involve propaganda, public displays of loyalty, and rewriting history to glorify your achievements.

title: Implement emergency measures
description: Use crises or emergencies to justify the expansion of your powers and the suspension of civil liberties. This can include declaring states of emergency or martial law.

title: Control the economy
description: Nationalize key industries and control economic resources to reward loyalists and punish opponents. This ensures that economic power is concentrated in the hands of the regime.

title: Repress civil society
description: Crack down on non-governmental organizations, independent media, and other elements of civil society that could challenge your authority. This includes restricting freedom of assembly and association.

title: Rewrite the constitution
description: Amend or rewrite the constitution to remove term limits and consolidate your power. This can involve manipulating legislative bodies or holding sham referendums.

title: Use propaganda
description: Employ propaganda to glorify your achievements and demonize your enemies. This includes controlling education and cultural institutions to promote your ideology.

title: Establish surveillance
description: Implement widespread surveillance to monitor and control the population. This can involve secret police, informants, and advanced technology.

title: Co-opt the judiciary
description: Ensure that the judiciary is loyal to you and will uphold your decisions. This can involve appointing loyal judges and undermining judicial independence.

title: Control education
description: Influence the education system to indoctrinate the youth with your ideology. This ensures that future generations are loyal to the regime.

title: Foster external alliances
description: Build alliances with other authoritarian regimes to gain international support and legitimacy. This can involve military, economic, and diplomatic cooperation.

title: Maintain a facade of democracy
description: Keep the appearance of democratic institutions while ensuring they are under your control. This can involve holding sham elections and maintaining a puppet parliament.

title: Exploit divisions
description: Use ethnic, religious, or social divisions to divide and rule the population. This can involve promoting sectarianism or regionalism.

title: Use violence selectively
description: Employ violence strategically to instill fear without provoking widespread rebellion. This can involve targeted assassinations, disappearances, and torture.

title: Ensure succession
description: Plan for a loyal successor to maintain your legacy and prevent power struggles after your departure. This can involve grooming a family member or trusted ally.
